title.text: Contents and evaluation of the first Slovenian-German online dictionary

abstractContent.text: This paper presents the first Slovenian-German and German-Slovenian online dictionary and contains evaluation figures for its Slovenian part.
Evaluations are based on coverage of a Slovenian newspaper corpus as well as on user queries.

introductionContent.text: The first Slovenian-German and GermanSlovenian online dictionary is available at http ://www.
de/users/1.)i rte/slo Its current version, which was completed in November 2002, contains more than 4,800 entries covering the content of a beginners' textbook for Slovenian.
Section 2 gives some information about the contents and structure of the dictionary.

Section 3 evaluates the Slovenian part, based on its coverage of lemmas in DELO, a Slovenian newspaper contained in the Nova beseda corpus at ZRC SAZU) as well as on its ability to fulfill user requests.

entities.text: DELO, a Slovenian newspaper contained in the Nova beseda corpus at ZRC SAZU

datasetContent.text: The evaluations of the Slovenian part of the dictionary concern its coverage of a) the corpus of the Slovenian newspaper DELO, as included in the ZRC SAZU corpus by the end of November 2002 (cf. Subsection 3.1); b) user queries to the dictionary which have been logged since the publication of the first trial version in April 2002 (cf. Subsection 3.2).
Based on these analyses, some qualitative remarks about the most frequent missing items will be made (cf. Subsection 3.3).
The evaluation is based on the Slovenian part of the complete "vocabulary" (words, inflected forms, expressions) of the dictionary.

The 4,841 entries actually contain 4,354 distinct Slovenian entries; this number is smaller than the overall number because some words are polysemous, or some expressions can have different translations.

The minimum number of Slovenian lemmas in the dictionary can be approximated by counting those entries which either contain no space in both languages, or which are reflexive verbs (ending on "_se" in Slovenian or starting with "sich_" in German): There are 2,428 such entries.

tableCaptions.text: Table 7: Frequent not covered closed class items.
